flawed_nl_solution:
Tom will be 30 in 5 years so now he is 30-5 = <<30-5=27>>27
2 years ago Tom was 27-2 = <<27-2=25>>25
At that time, Jared was twice as old as Tom so Jared was 25*2 = 50
Two years have since passed so Jared is now 50+2 = <<50+2=52>>52
#### 52

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
